Smart Toothbrush with Pressure Sensors: Develop a toothbrush with pressure sensors that alert users if they are applying too much pressure while brushing. This feature can help prevent gum damage and promote proper brushing technique.

Toothbrush with Built-in UV Sterilization: Add a UV sterilization feature to the toothbrush that kills bacteria and germs after each use. This can enhance hygiene and reduce the risk of cross-contamination.

Toothbrush with Replaceable Brush Head: Design a toothbrush with interchangeable brush heads for different oral care needs. For example, a soft-bristled head for sensitive teeth, a whitening head for teeth whitening, and a gum care head for maintaining gum health.

Toothbrush with LED Light: Incorporate an LED light into the toothbrush that illuminates the teeth and gums, making it easier to see and clean hard-to-reach areas. The light can also indicate the cleanliness of the toothbrush head.
Toothbrush with Music Feature: Create a toothbrush that plays soothing music or guided meditations to help users relax and focus during their daily oral care routine.
